name: Standard Investment Offer
content:
Dear {{clientName}},

Thank you for your interest in {{productName}}. We are pleased to present you with the following investment offer:

Investment Amount: {{investmentAmount}}
Expected Return: {{expectedReturn}}
Maturity Date: {{maturityDate}}

Terms and Conditions:
- This offer is valid for 30 days from the date of issuance
- Minimum investment period applies
- Early withdrawal may incur penalties

Please review the attached product prospectus for complete details.

Best regards,
WealthOps Team

name: Premium Client Offer
content:
Dear {{clientName}},

As a valued premium client, we are delighted to present an exclusive investment opportunity in {{productName}}.

Exclusive Offer Details:
Investment Amount: {{investmentAmount}}
Enhanced Return: {{expectedReturn}}
Maturity Date: {{maturityDate}}

Premium Benefits:
- Priority customer service

This premium offer is exclusively available to our select clients and is valid for 30 days.

Warm regards,
WealthOps Premium Services

name: Conservative Investment Offer
content:
Dear {{clientName}},

Based on your investment profile and preferences for conservative investments, we present this carefully selected opportunity in {{productName}}.

Offer Summary:
Investment Amount: {{investmentAmount}}
Stable Return: {{expectedReturn}}
Maturity Date: {{maturityDate}}

Key Features:

This conservative investment aligns with your risk profile and financial goals.
